comments: She has plenty of energy and makes the class extremely interesting. Jenna makes things clear when you do not understand the text you are required to read. You should take this class it\'s an easy A and long as you read and the plays are easy to understand and interesting.
The worst teacher ever, do not take this class! Save yourself.

She grades grammar, ink color, titles, useless things rather than context. I thought the school\'s GE required only 3 English classes, apparently she didn\'t get the memo that this is a Theater class. She asks for 2-3 page essays and then tears the pages apart with her red pen so much that if you rewrote it to please her it would be 5 r more pages.
